verses.text: HIVA fiefia kia ‘Elohimi ko hotau mālohinga: Fai ki he ‘Otua ‘o Sēkope ha fu‘u mavava.
Hua ‘a e hiva, pea to‘o ‘a e lali fāngongo: ‘A e ha‘ape le‘o mālie mo e helefilo.
Ifi talupite ‘i he fakamāhina fo‘ou, ‘I he kātoa ‘a e māhina, ‘i he kātoanga ‘atautolu.
He ko ha lao ia ‘o ‘Isileli pē, Ko e me‘a fakakonisitūtone ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o Sēkope.
Na‘a ne fokotu‘u ia ‘i ha‘a Siosifa ko e fakamo‘oni, ‘I he taimi na‘a ne hā‘ele atu ai ‘i ‘Isipite ke taa‘i: Fokifā na‘a ku ongo‘i ha le‘o na‘e ‘ikai te u maheni ai.
Na‘a ku faka‘atā hono uma mei he kavenga: Na‘e mahu‘i ‘a e kato mei hono nima.
Na‘a ke tautapa mai he faingata‘a, pea u hamusia; Na‘a ku tali koe mei he toi‘anga ‘o e mana; Na‘a ku sivi koe ‘i Vai-Mēlipa.” (Sila)
“Fanongo mai ‘e hoku kakai ka u fakamo‘oni atu: ‘Isileli ē, taumaiā ke ke fakaongo kiate au!
Ke ‘oua na‘a ‘iate koe ha ‘otua fo‘ou; ‘O ‘oua na‘a fai ki ha ‘otua muli ho‘o punou.
Ko Sihova au ko homou ‘Otua na‘e ‘ohake koā mei ‘Isipite: Mafa‘a ho ngutu ke lahi kau fakafonu pē.”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai tokanga ki hoku le‘o ‘e hoku kakai; Pea ‘ikai fie talangofua mai ‘a ‘Isileli,
Ko ia, na‘a ku tukuange ai kinautolu ki honau loto ta‘emangoi, Ke nau fou ‘i ha‘anautolu pē filio‘i.
‘Amusia ange ‘e au ke tokanga hoku kakai kiate au, ‘O fou ‘a ‘Isileli ‘i he hala ‘o‘oku!
Ko e kemo Kuo u fakamo‘ulaloa honau ngaahi fili, Pea u liliu hoku nima ke taa‘i honau kau fakamamahi.
‘E fakamalua kiate ia ‘a e kau fehi‘a kia Sihova Ka ko ho‘onautolu ē taimi ‘e lauikuonga.
Pehē te ne fafanga ia ‘aki ‘a e ‘elito‘i mahoa‘a: ‘Io, ne u fakamākona koe ‘aki ‘a e honi mei he maka.
